FeedItemCard.signInToLikeToast: You must be logged in to like a post.
FeedItemCard.signInToVoteToast: You must be logged in to vote.

CreatePostModal.title: Create a new post
CreatePostModal.description: Share an update, ask a question, or start a discussion with the community.
CreatePostModal.pollOptionsError: A poll must have at least 2 non-empty options.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Regain access to your account with the help of a trusted friend.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the generated QR code to a trusted friend who also uses DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Your friend scans the code with their app to confirm your identity.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted connection in your DamDoh network scan this QR code to verify your identity.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and will expire in 10 minutes.

layout.title: Admin Panel
layout.description: Platform management and content moderation tools.

generate.title: Generate a New Report
generate.description: Select parameters to generate a new compliance or activity report.
generate.userSearchPlaceholder: Search for a user by name or email...

list.title: Recently Generated Reports
list.description: View and download previously generated reports.
list.noReports: No reports have been generated yet.

toast.formIncompleteDescription: Please select a report type, a target user, and a date range.
toast.generateSuccessDescription: The report is being generated and will appear in the list below shortly.

AppFooter.tagline: Connecting the agricultural value chain for a sustainable future.

tooltip.onlinePending: {count} actions pending. Sync will start soon.
tooltip.onlineSynced: You are online and all data is synced.

offline.title: You are currently offline
offline.description: Data will be saved locally and synced when you reconnect.

syncing.title: Syncing Data
syncing.description: Uploading {count} offline actions to the server.

synced.title: Sync Complete
synced.description: Your offline data has been successfully saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync offline data. Will try again later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: This action will be completed when you're back online.
